main.title: Checking knowledge of the front-end from the school of programmers HH
main.description:
We invite beginners and front-end developers with little experience who want to learn new things from practitioners who develop services with a multi-million audience.

There is no age limit. To enter the school, you need to know HTML, CSS and JavaScript and have experience in interface development - at least a little.
